title: Risk Management
pmbok_description: Focuses on uncertainty management and continuous assessment.
prince2_description: Emphasizes risk registers and proactive responses.
iso_description: Provides general guidelines for identifying and treating risks.

title: Stakeholder Engagement
prince2_description: Roles defined in governance structure (executive, users, suppliers).
iso_description: Broad engagement practices but less detailed than PMBOK.

title: Tailoring / Adaptability
pmbok_description: Strong focus on tailoring practices to suit project context.
prince2_description: Provides explicit tailoring guidance in its 7 principles.
iso_description: Offers general adaptability recommendations but no deep detail.

title: Governance
pmbok_description: Governance is embedded in project value delivery and principles.
prince2_description: Clear governance roles (Executive, Project Board, Project Manager).
iso_description: High-level governance integration across project, program, portfolio.

title: Performance Domains
pmbok_description: Introduces 8 performance domains (stakeholders, team, lifecycle, planning, uncertainty, delivery, measurement, governance).
prince2_description: Focuses on 7 themes and processes, not domains.
